name: Chicken Empanada
description: Not so chicken now, are ya Empanada?
ingredients: Shredded Chicken Breast: or use leftover Poached Chicken, Roast Chicken, or Rotisserie Chicken
2-3 packs of frozen dough, or real dough

recipe.name: Make the chicken empanada filling
recipe.description: Start with peppers and onions in a Large skillet, then add garlic, cilantro, shredded cooked chicken, bouillon, tomato paste, onion powder, and garlic powder. The whole lovely pan will simmer away and imbue that shredded chicken and veggie filling with fragrance and flavor.

recipe.name: Prepare the dough
recipe.description: If frozen, make sure you let the dough thaw out. If using real dough, make sure you roll it out flat to prepare for the filling.

recipe.name: Fill the empanadas!
recipe.description: Take care not to over-fill—we recommend about 1/3 of a cup of filling per 6-inch dish of empanada dough.

recipe.name: Seal the empanadas
recipe.description: Egg wash with a Pastry brush, and use the tines of a fork to firmly press the edges closed.

recipe.name: Bake the empanadas
recipe.description: Place the empanadas on a baking sheet at 375°F for 35 minutes

recipe.name: EAT the empanadas
recipe.description: The best part! OR, you can eat a few and freeze the rest for later. They freeze beautifully.
